physics.entity

Class AABB2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • physics.entity.Entity2D
      • physics.entity.AABB2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Target2D

    public class AABB2D
extends Entity2D
    Represents an Axis Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) which is an entity; a rectangle without rotation
    Version:
    Dec 2014
    Author:
    Gordon Guan
